name.ja: マッドレア・アクエラ

requirement.en: If your opponent has 2 or more monsters on their field, send the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard.

effect.en: This turn, this card can attack twice. Also, you can destroy 1 face-up Level 6 Effect Monster on your opponent's field. Then, if you destroyed a monster by this effect, this card gains 600 ATK until the end of this turn.
